azurerm_api_management_group_user.description: Manages an API Management User Assignment to a Group.

user_id.description: The ID of the API Management User which should be assigned to this API Management Group. Changing this forces a new resource to be created.

group_name.description: The Name of the API Management Group within the API Management Service. Changing this forces a new resource to be created.

api_management_name.description: The name of the API Management Service. Changing this forces a new resource to be created.

resource_group_name.description: The name of the Resource Group in which the API Management Service exists. Changing this forces a new resource to be created.

id.description: The ID of the API Management Group User.

create.description: Used when creating the API Management Group User.

update.description: Used when updating the API Management Group User.

read.description: Used when retrieving the API Management Group User.

delete.description: Used when deleting the API Management Group User.
